entities.description: Presence of any long-lasting or repeated problems with emotions or mental health caused or worsened by alcohol use in the past 12 months.
Continued alcohol use despite having long-lasting or repeated problems with emotions or mental health in the past 12 months.
Occurrence of repeated blackouts while or after drinking alcohol in the past 12 months.
Continued alcohol use even after experiencing repeated blackouts in the past 12 months.
Various fixed response options provided for survey questions, including Yes, No, Did Not Use Alcohol in Past 12 Months or Used Less Than 6 Days, Never Used Alcohol, etc.

relationships.description: Indicates whether the respondent had long-lasting or repeated problems with emotions or mental health caused by alcohol use.
Indicates whether the respondent continued to use alcohol despite having emotional or mental health problems worsened by alcohol.
Indicates whether the respondent experienced repeated blackouts while or after drinking alcohol.
Indicates whether the respondent continued to use alcohol despite experiencing repeated blackouts.
Relates survey questions to the fixed response options provided.
